1: מִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Oh</n> יִתֵּ֤ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Oh that</n> רֹאשִׁי֙ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>my head</n> מַ֔יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>were waters</n> וְעֵינִ֖י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>and mine eyes</n> מְק֣וֹר <sup>4726 </sup> <n>a fountain</n> דִּמְעָ֑ה <sup>1832 </sup> <n>of tears</n> וְאֶבְכֶּה֙ <sup>1058 </sup> <n>that I might weep</n> יוֹמָ֣ם <sup>3119 </sup> <n>day</n> וָלַ֔יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>and night</n> אֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> חַֽלְלֵ֥י <sup>2491 </sup> <n>for the slain</n> בַת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>of the daughter</n> עַמִּֽי׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of my people</n>
2: מִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Oh</n> יִתְּנֵ֣נִי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Oh that</n> בַמִּדְבָּ֗ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>I had in the wilderness</n> מְלוֹן֙ <sup>4411 </sup> <n>a lodging place</n> אֹֽרְחִ֔ים <sup>732 </sup> <n>of wayfaring men</n> וְאֶֽעֶזְבָה֙ <sup>5800 </sup> <n>that I might leave</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַמִּ֔י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>my people</n> וְאֵלְכָ֖ה <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and go</n> מֵֽאִתָּ֑ם <sup>853 </sup> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>them</n> כֻלָּם֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>for all</n> מְנָ֣אֲפִ֔ים <sup>5003 </sup> <n>from them for they [be] all adulterers</n> עֲצֶ֖רֶת <sup>6116 </sup> <n>an assembly</n> בֹּגְדִֽים׃ <sup>898 </sup> <n>of treacherous men</n>
3: וַֽיַּדְרְכ֤וּ <sup>1869 </sup> <n>And they bend</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> לְשׁוֹנָם֙ <sup>3956 </sup> <n>their tongues</n> קַשְׁתָּ֣ם <sup>7198 </sup> <n>[like] their bow</n> שֶׁ֔קֶר <sup>8267 </sup> <n>[for] lies</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and not</n> לֶאֱמוּנָ֖ה <sup>530 </sup> <n>for the truth</n> גָּבְר֣וּ <sup>1396 </sup> <n>but they are not valiant</n> בָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon the earth</n> כִּי֩ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>from</n> מֵרָעָ֨ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>from evil</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> רָעָ֧ה ׀ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>to evil</n> יָצָ֛אוּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>for they proceed</n> וְאֹתִ֥י <sup>853 </sup> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָדָ֖עוּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and they know</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>not me saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> ס
4: אִ֤ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every one</n> מֵרֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>of his neighbour</n> הִשָּׁמֵ֔רוּ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>Take ye heed</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> אָ֖ח <sup>251 </sup> <n>ye not in any brother</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּבְטָ֑חוּ <sup>982 </sup> <n>and trust</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> אָח֙ <sup>251 </sup> <n>for every brother</n> עָק֣וֹב <sup>6117 </sup> <n>will utterly</n> יַעְקֹ֔ב <sup>6117 </sup> <n>supplant</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and every</n> רֵ֖עַ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>and every neighbour</n> רָכִ֥יל <sup>7400 </sup> <n>with slanders</n> יַהֲלֹֽךְ׃ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>will walk</n>
5: וְאִ֤ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every one</n> בְּרֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>his neighbour</n> יְהָתֵ֔לּוּ <sup>2048 </sup> <n>And they will deceive</n> וֶאֱמֶ֖ת <sup>571 </sup> <n>the truth</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and does not</n> יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and will not speak</n> לִמְּד֧וּ <sup>3925 </sup> <n>they have taught</n> לְשׁוֹנָ֛ם <sup>3956 </sup> <n>their tongue</n> דַּבֶּר־ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>to speak</n> שֶׁ֖קֶר <sup>8267 </sup> <n>lies</n> הַעֲוֵ֥ה <sup>5753 </sup> <n>themselves to commit iniquity</n> נִלְאֽוּ׃ <sup>3811 </sup> <n>[and] weary</n>

8: חֵ֥ץ <sup>2671 </sup> <n>[is as] an arrow</n> [שֹׁוחֵט כ] (שָׁח֛וּט <sup>7819 </sup> <n>kill</n> ק) לְשׁוֹנָ֖ם <sup>3956 </sup> <n>Their tongue</n> מִרְמָ֣ה <sup>4820 </sup> <n>deceit</n> דִבֵּ֑ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>it speaketh</n> בְּפִ֗יו <sup>6310 </sup> <n>with his mouth</n> שָׁל֤וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>peaceably</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>to his neighbour</n> יְדַבֵּ֔ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>[one] speaketh</n> וּבְקִרְבּ֖וֹ <sup>7130 </sup> <n>but in heart</n> יָשִׂ֥ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>he layeth</n> אָרְבּֽוֹ׃ <sup>696 </sup> <n>his wait</n>
9: הַעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>for</n> אֵ֥לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֶפְקָד־ <sup>6485 </sup> <n>Shall I not visit</n> בָּ֖ם נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>them for these [things]? saith</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אִ֚ם <sup>518 </sup> <n>On</n> בְּג֣וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>on such a nation</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>such</n> כָּזֶ֔ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִתְנַקֵּ֖ם <sup>5358 </sup> <n>be avenged</n> נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>shall not my soul</n> ס
10: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>For</n> הֶ֨הָרִ֜ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>For the mountains</n> אֶשָּׂ֧א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>will I take up</n> בְכִ֣י <sup>1065 </sup> <n>a weeping</n> וָנֶ֗הִי <sup>5092 </sup> <n>and wailing</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and for</n> נְא֤וֹת <sup>4999 </sup> <n>and for the habitations</n> מִדְבָּר֙ <sup>4057 </sup> <n>of the wilderness</n> קִינָ֔ה <sup>7015 </sup> <n>a lamentation</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> נִצְּתוּ֙ <sup>3341 </sup> <n>because they are burned up</n> מִבְּלִי־ <sup>1097 </sup> <n>no</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>so that none</n> עֹבֵ֔ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>can pass</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> שָׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>through [them] neither can [men] hear</n> ק֣וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>the voice</n> מִקְנֶ֑ה <sup>4735 </sup> <n>of the cattle</n> מֵע֤וֹף <sup>5775 </sup> <n>both the fowl</n> הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of the heavens</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> בְּהֵמָ֔ה <sup>929 </sup> <n>and the beast</n> נָדְד֖וּ <sup>5074 </sup> <n>are fled</n> הָלָֽכוּ׃ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>they are gone</n>

18: וּתְמַהֵ֕רְנָה <sup>4116 </sup> <n>And let them make haste</n> וְתִשֶּׂ֥נָה <sup>5375 </sup> <n>and take up</n> עָלֵ֖ינוּ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>up</n> נֶ֑הִי <sup>5092 </sup> <n>a wailing</n> וְתֵרַ֤דְנָה <sup>3381 </sup> <n>may run down</n> עֵינֵ֙ינוּ֙ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>for us that our eyes</n> דִּמְעָ֔ה <sup>1832 </sup> <n>with tears</n> וְעַפְעַפֵּ֖ינוּ <sup>6079 </sup> <n>and our eyelids</n> יִזְּלוּ־ <sup>5140 </sup> <n>gush out</n> מָֽיִם׃ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>with waters</n>
19: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> ק֥וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>For a voice</n> נְהִ֛י <sup>5092 </sup> <n>of wailing</n> נִשְׁמַ֥ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>is heard</n> מִצִּיּ֖וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>out of Zion</n> אֵ֣יךְ <sup>349 </sup> <n>How</n> שֻׁדָּ֑דְנוּ <sup>7703 </sup> <n>How are we spoiled</n> בֹּ֤שְׁנֽוּ <sup>954 </sup> <n>confounded</n> מְאֹד֙ <sup>3966 </sup> <n>we are greatly</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> עָזַ֣בְנוּ <sup>5800 </sup> <n>because we have forsaken</n> אָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> הִשְׁלִ֖יכוּ <sup>7993 </sup> <n>have cast [us] out</n> מִשְׁכְּנוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <sup>4908 </sup> <n>because our dwellings</n> ס
20: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Now</n> שְׁמַ֤עְנָה <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Yet hear</n> נָשִׁים֙ <sup>802 </sup> <n>O ye women</n> דְּבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>the word</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וְתִקַּ֥ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>receive</n> אָזְנְכֶ֖ם <sup>241 </sup> <n>and let your ear</n> דְּבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>the word</n> פִּ֑יו <sup>6310 </sup> <n>of his mouth</n> וְלַמֵּ֤דְנָה <sup>3925 </sup> <n>and teach</n> בְנֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>your daughters</n> נֶ֔הִי <sup>5092 </sup> <n>wailing</n> וְאִשָּׁ֥ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>and every one</n> רְעוּתָ֖הּ <sup>7468 </sup> <n>her neighbour</n> קִינָֽה׃ <sup>7015 </sup> <n>lamentation</n>
21: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עָ֤לָה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>is come up</n> מָ֙וֶת֙ <sup>4194 </sup> <n>For death</n> בְּחַלּוֹנֵ֔ינוּ <sup>2474 </sup> <n>into our windows</n> בָּ֖א <sup>935 </sup> <n>[and] is entered</n> בְּאַרְמְנוֹתֵ֑ינוּ <sup>759 </sup> <n>into our palaces</n> לְהַכְרִ֤ית <sup>3772 </sup> <n>to cut off</n> עוֹלָל֙ <sup>5768 </sup> <n>the children</n> מִח֔וּץ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>from without</n> בַּחוּרִ֖ים <sup>970 </sup> <n>[and] the young men</n> מֵרְחֹבֽוֹת׃ <sup>7339 </sup> <n>from the streets</n>
22: דַּבֵּ֗ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>Speak</n> כֹּ֚ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וְנָֽפְלָה֙ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>shall fall</n> נִבְלַ֣ת <sup>5038 </sup> <n>Even the carcases</n> הָֽאָדָ֔ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of men</n> כְּדֹ֖מֶן <sup>1828 </sup> <n>as dung</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> פְּנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>upon the open</n> הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>field</n> וּכְעָמִ֛יר <sup>5995 </sup> <n>and as the handful</n> מֵאַחֲרֵ֥י <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> הַקֹּצֵ֖ר <sup>7114 </sup> <n>the harvestman</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>no</n> מְאַסֵּֽף׃ <sup>622 </sup> <n>and none shall gather</n> ס
23: כֹּ֣ה ׀ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> יִתְהַלֵּ֤ל <sup>1984 </sup> <n>[man] glory</n> חָכָם֙ <sup>2450 </sup> <n>Let not the wise</n> בְּחָכְמָת֔וֹ <sup>2451 </sup> <n>in his wisdom</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> יִתְהַלֵּ֥ל <sup>1984 </sup> <n>[man] glory</n> הַגִּבּ֖וֹר <sup>1368 </sup> <n>neither let the mighty</n> בִּגְבֽוּרָת֑וֹ <sup>1369 </sup> <n>in his might</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> יִתְהַלֵּ֥ל <sup>1984 </sup> <n>[man] glory</n> עָשִׁ֖יר <sup>6223 </sup> <n>let not the rich</n> בְּעָשְׁרֽוֹ׃ <sup>6239 </sup> <n>in his riches</n>
24: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> בְּזֹ֞את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>who</n> יִתְהַלֵּ֣ל <sup>1984 </sup> <n>But let him that glorieth</n> הַמִּתְהַלֵּ֗ל <sup>1984 </sup> <n>glory</n> הַשְׂכֵּל֮ <sup>7919 </sup> <n>in this that he understandeth</n> וְיָדֹ֣עַ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and knoweth</n> אוֹתִי֒ <sup>853 </sup> כִּ֚י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>me that I [am] the LORD</n> עֹ֥שֶׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>which exercise</n> חֶ֛סֶד <sup>2617 </sup> <n>lovingkindness</n> מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>judgment</n> וּצְדָקָ֖ה <sup>6666 </sup> <n>and righteousness</n> בָּאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the earth</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>in</n> בְאֵ֥לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> חָפַ֖צְתִּי <sup>2654 </sup> <n>for in these [things] I delight</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> ס
25: הִנֵּ֛ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> יָמִ֥ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>Behold the days</n> בָּאִ֖ים <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וּפָ֣קַדְתִּ֔י <sup>6485 </sup> <n>that I will punish</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מ֖וּל <sup>4135 </sup> <n>all [them which are] circumcised</n> בְּעָרְלָֽה׃ <sup>6190 </sup> <n>with the uncircumcised</n>
26: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> מִצְרַ֣יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>Egypt</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> יְהוּדָ֗ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>and Judah</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> אֱד֞וֹם <sup>123 </sup> <n>and Edom</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> בְּנֵ֤י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and the children</n> עַמּוֹן֙ <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> מוֹאָ֔ב <sup>4124 </sup> <n>and Moab</n> וְעַל֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> קְצוּצֵ֣י <sup>7112 </sup> <n>and all [that are] in the utmost</n> פֵאָ֔ה <sup>6285 </sup> <n>corners</n> הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <sup>3427 </sup> <n>that dwell</n> בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>in the wilderness</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>for all</n> הַגּוֹיִם֙ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>for all [these] nations</n> עֲרֵלִ֔ים <sup>6189 </sup> <n>[are] uncircumcised</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and all the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> עַרְלֵי־ <sup>6189 </sup> <n>[are] uncircumcised</n> לֵֽב׃ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>in the heart</n> ס
